Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ThinModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ThinModel
public final class ThinModel extends Object
Model representation for serialization and deserialization. Holds the state of the match of the Model that is received by the client, and saved by the server
